data.name: Propagation: Paradise Hotel
data.description:
Trapped inside the Paradise Hotel, where a strange illness has turned people into savage creatures, you are desperate to find your sister. Play as Emily Diaz, explore dark surroundings, gather resources, and survive terrifying encounters. This intense solo VR survival horror game with great storytelling will get your adrenaline pumping.

## IMMERSIVE STORY
Emily's journey will take you through extreme emotions and intense phases of stealth, exploration or action. Meet allies and learn how to survive your enemies.

## HORROR ATMOSPHERE
Enter the incredibly terrifying atmosphere of Propagation. The sound design, lighting, and visuals all combine to create a truly immersive experience that will keep you on edge.

## GAME MECHANICS
You will need all your skills and your wits to progress:
- Gather resources
- Solve puzzles
- Use tools from your inventory
- Choose to avoid or confront enemies
- Reload your gun under stress
- Free movement and teleportation locomotion support

changelog.change_log:
# Update 1.2.4
## New features
- bHaptics support (to enable, go to the Quest Settings->Apps->Permissions->Nearby devices and activate permissions for Propagation: Paradise Hotel)

# Update 1.2.3
## New features
- hands now collide with the environment

# 1.1.5 - (25)
## New features
- Add rats
- Add lightning strikes through windows

## General updates
- Nerf door noise alerting enemies
- Nerf resurrection time for strong enemies
- Cap max resurrection number according to difficulty
- Inventory opens on the last visited page

## Balancing
- Ease zombie punching (extended body hitbox)
- Can kill zombies with punches (Easy only)
- Body shots deal more damage to enemies (Easy only)
- Prevent resource-related soft lock in final boss fight

## Bug fixes
- Fix minor map discovering issues (Pool & Gym)
- Account for death in game time
- Fix continuous rotation pivot issue

# 1.1.4.1-21
## New features
- New popup tutorial : Punch
- New menu option : Controller Vibrations
- New menu option : Hide wire to interactive objects
- New menu option : Locomotion mode ("Continuous only" / "Teleport only" / "Both")
- New help voiceline during the boss fight

## General updates
- Adjust some teleportation snap points
- Tutorials better fit the settings (Grabbing Mode, Inverted controls, Locomotion Mode, Firearm side etc...)

## Balancing

## Bug fixes
- Fix some cropped texts in various languages
- Non-mandatory tutorial popups disappear after 45s if ignored
- Fix application icon
- Alternative/Active grab on inventory and screwdriver (trigger grab is irrelevant in this case)
- Fix some missed Mip maps (optimization)
- Forbid backward running exploit when "Forward direction = Hand"
- Fix speed issue when "Inverted controls = True"
- Fix some spelling mistakes
- Fix remaining gizmo wires issue
- Fix NPC stuck issue
